title: The Good News of 2020 w/ Posh People
description: Max Fosh interviews posh people to find out what they consider to be the good news of 2020.
summary: Max Fosh humorously explores the perspective of posh people on the 'good news' of 2020.
payoff: The humor comes from the contrast between the privileged viewpoint of the posh people and the reality of the challenging events of 2020, showcasing their disconnect from the rest of society.
